SELECT NVL(COUNT(RP.RONO), NULL) AS "TOTALROOMPAY", NVL(R.RONO, NULL) AS "RONO", NVL(R.ROOMS_TITLE, NULL) AS "ROOMS_TITLE", NVL(R.ADD_BASIC, NULL) AS "ADD_BASIC", NVL(R.START_DATE, NULL) AS "START_DATE", NVL(R.STATUS, NULL) AS "STATUS" FROM ROOMSPAY RP FULL OUTER JOIN ROOMS R ON(R.RONO = RP.RONO) WHERE R.USNO= #{ptno} group by NVL(R.ROOMS_TITLE, NULL), R.ROOMS_TITLE, NULL, R.ROOMS_TITLE, NULL, NVL(R.RONO, NULL), R.RONO, NULL, NVL(R.ADD_BASIC, NULL), R.ADD_BASIC, NULL, NVL(R.START_DATE, NULL), NVL(R.STATUS, NULL)

SELECT NVL(COUNT(EP.EXNO), NULL) AS "TOTALEXPPAY", NVL(E.EXNO, NULL) AS "EXNO", NVL(E.EXP_TITLE, NULL) AS "EXP_TITLE", NVL(E.ADD_BASIC, NULL) AS "ADD_BASIC", NVL(E.START_DATE, NULL) AS "START_DATE", NVL(E.STATUS, NULL) AS "STATUS" FROM EXPPAY EP FULL OUTER JOIN EXPERIENCE E ON(E.EXNO = EP.EXNO) WHERE E.USNO= #{ptno} group by NVL(E.EXNO, NULL), NVL(E.EXP_TITLE, NULL), NVL(E.ADD_BASIC, NULL), NVL(E.START_DATE, NULL), NVL(E.STATUS, NULL)
